channel.title: Error connecting to server? help?
channel.description: Hello moparscape ive recently been trying to create a downloadable client but i dont really know much bout clients im more about the source :) I changed the server ip to my no-ip (also i tryed my normal ip) i deleted all class files then compiled then i jarred my client right and i set to correct class files then i created keystore and signed with correct alias and passes then i zipped the files put on dropbox then when my friends try to open it it loads and everything but says error connecting to server If anybody can tell me what i did wrong i would really apreccaite it Thanks!

item.title: Error connecting to server? help?
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:5, topic:542625”][quote author=xhar link=topic=661501.msg4421607#msg4421607 date=1398719713]
Wrong section I think and I port forwarded right I know how to code a source lol but not good with a client
[/quote]

yeah… portforwarding has nothing to do with “coding a source” but ok[/quote]
No one mentioned that above.

Wrong section >> here is the right section.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server? help?

item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

Wrong section I think and I port forwarded right I know how to code a source lol but not good with a client

yeah… portforwarding has nothing to do with “coding a source” but ok

item.title: Error connecting to server? help?
item.dc:creator: @arean arean
item.description:
@arean wrote:

I’d suggest trying to go on your server with your client before doing all the preperation for jarring your client (I.e with the java files, and the run.bat to run your client).

See if that works and if it doesn’t get a new client maybe or if it does you done something wrong with the jarring.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server? help?
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

you most likely portforwarded wrong. try it again.

and if you just want to login to develope the server, there’s no need for a no-ip IP. you could use 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server? help?
item.dc:creator: @xhar xhar
item.description:
@xhar wrote:

Hello moparscape ive recently been trying to create a downloadable client but i dont really know much bout clients im more about the source
I changed the server ip to my no-ip (also i tryed my normal ip) i deleted all class files then compiled then i jarred my client right and i set to correct class files then i created keystore and signed with correct alias and passes then i zipped the files put on dropbox then when my friends try to open it it loads and everything but says error connecting to server
If anybody can tell me what i did wrong i would really apreccaite it Thanks!
